name: Musicalligraphy
description:
It is the combination of musicality and calligraphy.“The aim is to try and go deeper into bringing creative contemporary calligraphy to the musical aspect. It means, how can we hear the pieces? How can we compose each element of the piece as notes?”
 a way of painting that emphasises "the comprehensive link between the eye and the ear", 
In my works, letters are transformed into sweeping, sinuous curves.
